intro: Nuxia autunesii, commonly known as autumn nuxia, is a flowering plant native to southern Africa. It belongs to the family Proteaceae and is characterized by its woody shrub form. The plant produces small, white or yellowish flowers that are clustered in inflorescences. Its leaves are simple, alternate, and often have a rough texture. Nuxia autunesii is adapted to dry conditions and is often found in rocky or sandy soils.
